title: Resolve Incorrect Item Shipped
description: A customer received the wrong item in their online order and contacts customer service via chat.

tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the order details.

tasks.description: Apologize and create a no-charge replacement order for the correct item.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new order is placed to send the correct item.

tasks.description: Email the customer a pre-paid return shipping label to send back the incorrect item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is provided with an easy way to return the wrong item at no cost.
